scripts.clean-nacara-layouts-fable: shx rm -rf src/Layouts/Standard/fableBuild && shx rm -rf src/Layouts/Standard/bin && shx rm -rf src/Layouts/Standard/obj && shx rm -rf src/Layouts/Standard/dist
scripts.clean-nacara: shx rm -rf src/Nacara/fableBuild && shx rm -rf src/Nacara/Source/bin && shx rm -rf src/Nacara/Source/obj && shx rm -rf src/Nacara/dist
scripts.watch-nacara-layout-fable: dotnet fable src/Layouts/Standard --outDir src/Layouts/Standard/fableBuild --watch --sourceMaps --run npm run watch-nacara-layout-rollup
scripts.watch-nacara-fable: dotnet fable src/Nacara/Source --outDir src/Nacara/fableBuild --watch --sourceMaps --run npm run watch-nacara-rollup
scripts.prewatch: npm run clean && shx mkdir src/Nacara/dist && shx mkdir src/Layouts/Standard/dist
scripts.build-nacara-rollup: npm run build-nacara-fable && rollup -c src/Nacara/rollup.config.js --environment BUILD:production
scripts.build-nacara-layout-rollup: npm run build-nacara-layout-fable && rollup -c src/Layouts/Standard/rollup.config.js --environment BUILD:production
scripts.release: npm run release-nacara-npm && npm run release-nacara-layout-standard-npm
